reviews.title: THIS IS SO RACIST!!!
reviews.comment: Typical racist hate propaganda from infantile uninformed liberals. Whites r the new suppressed race. The racism against whites in the US is terrible. White ppl have achieved many great things why can\'t we say white pride or white power because it\'s \"racist\" but asians, blacks, spanish & everyone else can say both & it\'s \"politically correct\". !!WHITE PRIDE!!
